_description: A four-line acrostic on death — two couplets in John Grimestone’s sermon notes

NLS18721.Transcription:
Deth is a dredful dettourDeth is an Elenge herbergourDeth is a
                    trewe tollere& Deth is an hardi huntere
NLS18721.Editions:
Wilson,  Edward. 
             A Descriptive Index of the English Lyrics in John of Grimestone’s
                Preaching Book.
Medium Ævum Monographs
         n.s. 2. Oxford, 1973: 23.
